DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate 18F-AV-45 positron emission tomography ( PET ) image distinguish healthy control subject , subject Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) Mild cognitive impairment ( MCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Trial 18F-AV-45 Positron Emission Tomography ( PET ) Imaging Healthy Volunteers , Patients With Mild Cognitive Impairment ( MCI ) Patients With Alzheimer 's Disease ( AD )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria AD : Male female > =50 year age Meet National Institute Neurological Communicative Diseases Stroke/Alzheimer 's Disease Related Disorders Association ( NINCDS ) criteria probable AD MMSE score 1024 Inclusion Criteria MCI : Male female > =50 year age Have Clinical Dementia Rating ( CDR ) 0.5 MMSE > 24 Normal subject : Male female > =50 year age MMSE > =29 Normal psychometric test battery screen Provide inform consent Have history current diagnosis neurologic disease Have currently diagnosis neurodegenerative disease Have participate experimental therapy target amyloid plaque
